column4: Hi all.. Just looking for a headsup before installing Hoary on an old laptop. DellLatitude CP, with a CS3237 Soundchip. Not being able to autoconfigure it with the LiveCD..
Any advice for the actual install.. ? It's an ISA chip, so the automatic Alsa config can't find it.
does it works with Knoppix (which you're using now, correct?)
Ubuntu uses ESD, but to be honest, I know nothing about sound
